DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Pregnancy Status Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth._A condition or state at a particular time._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
